    • roomIsAvailable

      public static boolean roomIsAvailable(Room room, LocalDate checkIn, LocalDate checkOut)
      Checks if a room is available to be booked between two dates.
      Parameters:
      room - The Room object to be checked.
      checkIn - The starting date to be checked.
      checkOut - The ending date to be checked.
      Returns:
      A boolean value indicating whether the room is available for booking.

    • getCostOfRoom

      public static int getCostOfRoom(double[] rates, LocalDate checkIn, LocalDate checkOut)
      Returns the cost of a room by passing in the room's rates for the week, the check-in date and the check-out date.
      Parameters:
      rates - A room's rates for each day of the week.
      checkIn - The check-in date.
      checkOut - The check-out date.
      Returns:
      The total cost to book a room.
